tasks.cover-all: APP_ENV=test deno run test-cover && deno run cover && deno run cover-lcov && deno run cover-html
tasks.cover-lcov: APP_ENV=test rm -f coverage.lcov && deno coverage cov_profile --lcov > coverage.lcov
tasks.cover-html: APP_ENV=test rm -rf ./html_cov && genhtml --ignore-errors inconsistent,category -o html_cov coverage.lcov
